content: Chao Li @ Beijing Jiaotong University Chao LiPh.D., Associate Professor, School of Computer and Information Technology, Beijing Jiaotong University. Follow Beijing, China Email ResearchGate Google Scholar PublonsI am an Associate Professor in the School of Computer and Information Technology at Beijing Jiaotong University. My current research interests are focused on Blockchain and Data Privacy.
